sentences.en: Design the detection method of watermark bars of Euros.
sentences.cn: 提出了欧元水印条码的识别方法.

sentences.en: Documents with this kind of watermark are difficult to duplicate.
sentences.cn: 带有这种水印的文件很难被复制.

sentences.en: Experimentation shows that this watermark algorithm has good concealment and frangibility.
sentences.cn: 试验表明,该水印算法有很好的隐蔽性和脆弱性.

sentences.en: In these algorithms, meaningful binary images are adopted as the watermark.
sentences.cn: 上述所提出的算法均采用有意义的二值图像作为水印.

sentences.en: Shaded watermark: watermark with opaque rather than tranaparent appearance.
sentences.cn: 暗调水印: 有着遮光而并不是透光现像的水印.

sentences.en: She finally released Shepherd Moons, her follow - up to Watermark, in 1991.
sentences.cn: 终于在1991年,恩雅发行了她《水印》的续篇《牧羊人之月》.

sentences.en: Simple operation, the technical and professional effectiveness, which is " easily watermark. "
sentences.cn: 简单的操作 、 专业的技术与效果, 这就是 “ 轻松水印 ”.

sentences.en: Spread Spectrum Watermark complete source code can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 扩频水印完整的源代码可以直接使用.

sentences.en: The algorithm is the base of application for presswork watermark.
sentences.cn: 本算法的提出为印刷水印的应用提出了一种有效的解决方案.

sentences.en: The card has a digital watermark detectable only by electronic cash dispensers.
sentences.cn: 这种卡上带有只能被电子取款机识别的数码水印。

sentences.en: The information hiding technology mainly includes the steganography and digital watermark technology.
sentences.cn: 信息隐藏技术主要包括信息隐匿技术和数字水印技术.

sentences.en: The publication of reference watermark does not compromise the embedding one.
sentences.cn: 参考水印的信息公开不会降低嵌入水印的安全性.

sentences.en: The watermark on the banknote is to prevent forgery.
sentences.cn: 钞票上的浮水印是用来防止伪造的.

sentences.en: The zero - watermark method is a new digital watermarking method.
sentences.cn: 零水印方法是一种新的数字水印方法.

sentences.en: Two blind watermark algorithms based on HVS in DCT domain are proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了DCT变换域上基于人类视觉特性(HVS)的两种盲水印添加方法.

sentences.en: Watermark Layout is in the attachment file for both type paper.
sentences.cn: 水印布局是作为打印纸的附件文件.

words.tran_cn: （美）流域；分水岭；集水区；转折点

phrases.tran_cn: 嵌入水印；嵌入水印滤镜

trans.tran_en: a special design put onto paper, especially bank notes, that can only be seen when you hold it up to the light
